name: Otp
summary: Simple OTP helpers with fluent and static APIs.

members.name: TotpUri
members.summary: Builds a TOTP URI from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static string TotpUri(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: TotpUri
members.summary: Builds a TOTP URI from raw secret bytes.
members.signature: static string TotpUri(string issuer, string account, byte[] secret, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: HotpUri
members.summary: Builds a HOTP URI from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static string HotpUri(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.name: HotpUri
members.summary: Builds a HOTP URI from raw secret bytes.
members.signature: static string HotpUri(string issuer, string account, byte[] secret, long counter, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.name: TotpPng
members.summary: Renders a TOTP QR as PNG from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static byte[] TotpPng(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: TotpSvg
members.summary: Renders a TOTP QR as SVG from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static string TotpSvg(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: TotpHtml
members.summary: Renders a TOTP QR as HTML from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static string TotpHtml(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: TotpJpeg
members.summary: Renders a TOTP QR as JPEG from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static byte[] TotpJpeg(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: HotpPng
members.summary: Renders a HOTP QR as PNG from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static byte[] HotpPng(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.summary: Renders a HOTP QR as SVG from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static string HotpSvg(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.name: HotpHtml
members.summary: Renders a HOTP QR as HTML from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static string HotpHtml(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.name: HotpJpeg
members.summary: Renders a HOTP QR as JPEG from a Base32 secret.
members.signature: static byte[] HotpJpeg(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.name: SaveTotpPng
members.summary: Saves a TOTP PNG to a file.
members.signature: static string SaveTotpPng(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, string path, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: SaveTotpPng
members.summary: Saves a TOTP PNG to a stream.
members.signature: static void SaveTotpPng(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, Stream stream, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: SaveTotpSvg
members.summary: Saves a TOTP SVG to a file.
members.signature: static string SaveTotpSvg(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, string path, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: SaveTotpSvg
members.summary: Saves a TOTP SVG to a stream.
members.signature: static void SaveTotpSvg(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, Stream stream, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period)

members.name: SaveTotpHtml
members.summary: Saves a TOTP HTML to a file.
members.signature: static string SaveTotpHtml(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, string path, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period, string title)

members.name: SaveTotpHtml
members.summary: Saves a TOTP HTML to a stream.
members.signature: static void SaveTotpHtml(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, Stream stream, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period, string title)

members.signature: static void SaveHotpPng(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, Stream stream, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.signature: static void SaveHotpJpeg(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, Stream stream, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits)

members.name: SaveTotp
members.summary:
Saves a TOTP QR based on file extension (.png/.svg/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string SaveTotp(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, string path, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, int period, string title)

members.name: SaveHotp
members.summary:
Saves a HOTP QR based on file extension (.png/.svg/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string SaveHotp(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, string path, QrEasyOptions options, OtpAlgorithm alg, int digits, string title)

members.name: Totp
members.summary: Starts a fluent TOTP builder.
members.signature: static Otp.TotpBuilder Totp(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: Hotp
members.summary: Starts a fluent HOTP builder.
members.signature: static Otp.HotpBuilder Hotp(string issuer, string account, string secretBase32, long counter, QrEasyOptions options)
